title: 382. Andy, Amir Odom & DJ CTI: Houston Suspects First Robbery, Germany Operating Hundreds Fake Far-Right Social Media Accounts & FBI Agent Exposing Unjust Persecution Of Conservatives
itunes:title: 382. Andy, Amir Odom & DJ CTI: Houston Suspects First Robbery, Germany Operating Hundreds Fake Far-Right Social Media Accounts & FBI Agent Exposing Unjust Persecution Of Conservatives
description: In today's episode, Andy & DJ are joined in the studio by Amir Odom. They discuss a Houston suspect leaving empty-handed after telling a fast-food employee it's his first robbery, Germany operating hundreds of fake far-right social media accounts, and the FBI agent who was suspended after complaining about the exaggerated threat of domestic terrorism meant to harass conservative Americans.
